statements: SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction;
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_level FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT well_being_rating, satisfaction_level FROM employee_satisfaction ORDER BY well_being_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 0.5 AND well_being_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE well_being_rating > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_level FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level < 0.5;
SELECT employee_id, well_being_rating FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level >= 0.8 ORDER BY well_being_rating;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_level) AS average_satisfaction FROM employee_satisfaction;
SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level BETWEEN 0.6 AND 0.8 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction;
SELECT satisfaction_rating, well_being_rating FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM employee_feedback GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_rating) AS highest_satisfaction_rating FROM employee_satisfaction;
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_rating, well_being_rating FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_rating > 5 ORDER BY well_being_rating DESC
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_rating, feedback FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND satisfaction_rating >= 3

SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM employee_satisfaction JOIN employee_feedback ON employee_satisfaction.employee_id = employee_feedback.employee_id GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC

SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_rating, feedback_description FROM employee_satisfaction JOIN employee_feedback ON employee_satisfaction.employee_id = employee_feedback.employee_id WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS avg_rating FROM employee_satisfaction GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_rating > 4
SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, satisfaction_score FROM employee_satisfaction ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM department WHERE department_name LIKE '%ngineering%';
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_score, well_being_score FROM survey_results WHERE satisfaction_score > 70;
SELECT * FROM survey_results ORDER BY survey_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM department;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM department ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, satisfaction_score, well_being_score FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_results WHERE satisfaction_score < 50 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_satisfaction INNER JOIN survey_results ON employee_satisfaction.employee_id = survey_results.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department, job_title FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department, job_title FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT name, job_title FROM employees WHERE satisfaction_level > 0.8 ORDER BY name;
SELECT employee_id, department, job_title FROM employees WHERE department LIKE '%Engineering%' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(survey_score), date_trunc('month', survey_date) AS month FROM surveys GROUP BY month ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, employee_id FROM feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 100 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_profile;
SELECT name, job_title FROM employee_profile WHERE department='HR';
SELECT join_date, satisfaction_score FROM employee_profile ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT activity_name, duration_hours FROM wellness_activities WHERE activity_type='Yoga' ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_profile WHERE department = 'Tech' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT name, job_title FROM employee_profile WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback JOIN employee_profile USING (employee_id) WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, wellness_type, wellness_date FROM employee_wellness WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, survey_date, question1, question2 FROM survey_results ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
